states.name: fracture_whisper
states.description: Almost-silent, tinny, half-fretted. Use heavy palm-mute or light finger pressure.

states.name: strained_hint
states.description: Wiry and present. Slight increase in sustain and harmonic energy.

states.name: threaded_tension
states.description: Clearer pitch, still thin. Good for intermediate narrative beats.

states.name: near_presence
states.description: Warm, resonant. The motif almost resolves here.

states.name: embodied_resolve
states.description: Full-bodied tone; release and narrative payoff.

mappings.player_proximity: adds +1 state when within close proximity to older self
